to model.from sentence: In this paper , we propose a novel method to model Sentiment Dependencies with Graph Convolutional Networks ( SDGCN ) for aspect - level sentiment classification .

simple and effective convolutional neura.from sentence: GCN is a simple and effective convolutional neural network operating on graphs , which can catch inter-dependent information from rich relational data .

edge.from sentence: In our case , an aspect is treated as a node , and an edge represents the sentiment dependency relation of two nodes .

every node.from sentence: For every node in graph , GCN encodes relevant information about its neighborhoods as a new feature representation vector .

sentiment dependencies.from sentence: Our model learns the sentiment dependencies of aspects via this graph structure .

first to consider.from sentence: As far as we know , our work is the first to consider the sentiment dependencies between aspects in one sentence for aspect - level sentiment classification task .

applies.from sentence: Furthermore , in order to capture the aspect - specific representations , our model applies bidirectional attention mechanism with position encoding before GCN .
